info.name: Social Media API - Complete Collection
info.description:
Complete API documentation for Social Media Platform with JWT Authentication and Role-Based Access Control (RBAC).

## Features
- JWT Authentication with 7-day expiration
- Role-Based Access Control (Admin & User)
- Redis Caching for optimized performance
- Cloudinary integration for image uploads

## Base URLs
- **Production:** https://social-media-backend-dwnj.onrender.com
- **Development:** http://localhost:8800

## Authentication
Most endpoints require a JWT token. After login/register, copy the token from the response and set it in the collection variable `{{token}}`.

## Admin Credentials
- **Username:** admin
- **Email:** admin@socialapp.com
- **Password:** Admin@123

item.name: Authentication

request.description:
Register a new user account.

**Request Body:**
- `username` (string, required): 3-20 characters
- `email` (string, required): Valid email address
- `password` (string, required): Minimum 6 characters

**Response:**
- `token` (string): JWT token (expires in 7 days)
- `user` (object): User details with `_id`, `username`, `email`, `isAdmin`

**Note:** New users are created with `isAdmin: false` by default. Admins must be created using the backend script.

Login with existing user credentials.

**Request Body:**
- `email` (string, required): User's email
- `password` (string, required): User's password

**Response:**
- `token` (string): JWT token for authentication
- `user` (object): Complete user profile

**Test Script:** Automatically saves token to collection variables for use in subsequent requests.

Login as admin user to test admin-specific features.

**Default Admin Credentials:**
- Email: admin@socialapp.com
- Password: Admin@123

**Admin Capabilities:**
- Delete any post
- Update any user
- Delete any user
- All regular user features

item.description: Authentication endpoints for user registration and login. These endpoints return JWT tokens that must be included in subsequent requests.

item.name: Users

request.description:
Get user details by user ID.

**Query Parameters:**
- `userId` (string, required): User's MongoDB ObjectId

**Response:**
- Complete user profile including followers, followings, profile pictures, bio, etc.

**Note:** Password is excluded from response.

Get user details by username.

**Query Parameters:**
- `username` (string, required): User's unique username

**Response:**
- Complete user profile

**Use Case:** Used for profile pages and user search.

Update user profile information.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT token)

**Authorization:**
- Users can update their own profile
- Admins can update any profile

**Request Body (all optional):**
- `desc` (string): User bio/description
- `city` (string): Current city
- `from` (string): Hometown
- `relationship` (number): 1=Single, 2=In Relationship, 3=Married
- `profilePicture` (string): URL to profile image
- `coverPicture` (string): URL to cover image

**Note:** Password updates require current password verification (not implemented yet).

Delete a user account.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT token)

**Authorization:**
- Users can delete their own account
- Admins can delete any account

**Response:**
- Success message confirming deletion

**Warning:** This action is irreversible!

Follow or unfollow a user.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT token)

**Path Parameters:**
- `userId` (string): ID of user to follow/unfollow

**Behavior:**
- If not following â†’ Adds to followings and target's followers
- If already following â†’ Removes from followings and target's followers

**Response:**
- "User has been followed" or "User has been unfollowed"

**Note:** User ID is extracted from JWT token automatically.

Search for users by username.

**Query Parameters:**
- `q` (string, required): Search query

**Features:**
- Case-insensitive search
- Partial matching
- Uses MongoDB text index for fast searching

**Response:**
- Array of matching users with `_id`, `username`, `profilePicture`

**Performance:** Optimized with database indexing.

Get list of user's friends (followings).

**Path Parameters:**
- `userId` (string): User's ID

**Response:**
- Array of user objects for each friend
- Includes `_id`, `username`, `profilePicture`

**Use Case:** Display friends list on profile page.

item.description: User management endpoints including profile operations, follow/unfollow, and search functionality.

item.name: Posts

request.description:
Create a new post.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT token)

**Request Body:**
- `desc` (string, optional): Post description (max 500 characters)
- `img` (string, optional): URL to post image (Cloudinary URL)

**Response:**
- Complete post object with `_id`, `userId`, `desc`, `img`, `likes`, `createdAt`

**Note:** User ID is extracted from JWT token automatically.

**Cache Invalidation:** Clears timeline and profile caches to ensure fresh data.

Get a specific post by ID.

**Path Parameters:**
- `postId` (string): Post's MongoDB ObjectId

**Response:**
- Complete post object

**Caching:**
- Cached for 5 minutes
- Cache key: `cache:/api/posts/:id`

**Performance:** ~3-10ms (cached), ~50-100ms (database)

Update an existing post.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT token)

**Authorization:**
- Users can update their own posts
- Admins can update any post

**Path Parameters:**
- `postId` (string): Post's ID

**Request Body:**
- `desc` (string): Updated description
- `img` (string): Updated image URL

**Cache Invalidation:** Clears all post-related caches.

Delete a post.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT token)

**Authorization:**
- Users can delete their own posts
- Admins can delete any post

**Path Parameters:**
- `postId` (string): Post's ID

**Response:**
- Success message confirming deletion

**Cache Invalidation:** Clears all post-related caches.

**Frontend Implementation:** Shows "Delete (Admin)" for admin deleting others' posts.

Like or unlike a post.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT token)

**Path Parameters:**
- `postId` (string): Post's ID

**Behavior:**
- If not liked â†’ Adds user ID to likes array
- If already liked â†’ Removes user ID from likes array

**Response:**
- "The post has been liked" or "The post has been disliked"

**Note:** User ID is extracted from JWT token automatically.

**Cache Invalidation:** Clears specific post cache.

Get personalized timeline/feed for a user.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT token)

**Path Parameters:**
- `userId` (string): User's ID

**Response:**
- Array of posts from user and their followings
- Sorted by creation date (newest first)

**Caching:**
- Cached for 2 minutes
- Cache key: `cache:/api/posts/timeline/all/:userId`

**Performance:**
- First request: ~500ms
- Cached request: ~3-10ms (99.8% faster)

**Use Case:** Main feed on home page.

Get all posts by a specific user.

**Authentication:** Required (JWT token)

**Path Parameters:**
- `username` (string): User's username

**Response:**
- Array of user's posts
- Sorted by creation date (newest first)

**Caching:**
- Cached for 3 minutes
- Cache key: `cache:/api/posts/profile/:username`

**Use Case:** Profile page displaying user's posts.

Search posts by username.

**Query Parameters:**
- `username` (string): Search query for username

**Response:**
- Array of posts by users matching the search query

**Caching:**
- Cached for 5 minutes
- Cache key: `cache:/api/posts/search?username=:query`

**Performance:** Uses database indexing for fast search.
